name: CongoOS
description:
Welcome to Congo Inc!

For years we have been the #1 seller of automated household products. We're more than excited for you to join the team! 

Thank you for accepting the position ENTRY-LEVEL APPLIANCE ACTIVATOR. As discussed in the post-NDA meeting, our products are actually manually activated by our employees by monitoring the customer through CCTV and determining if they are requesting that an appliance be activated.

Your job is to use your Cam Manager 0.3 to monitor the family and their needs.  When a family member wants to use an appliance (  ), use the congo_appliance_rootkit.exe to activate the appliance.

Recent observations to remember:

  • activating a product too early will result in a complaint from the customer
  • waiting too long to activate a product will result in a complaint from the customer

Any complaints are taken seriously here at Congo Inc, so please be careful.

Sincerely,

Your boss

PS. This is my submission for Mechanic Jam 6. I may work on this further and add a lot more ideas. Other platform releases will be added soon.
